extendedInfo.description: Play, understand, speak and write!Get the free Basic and Advanced Vocabulary at home and on-the-go: study vocabulary with interactive exercises, systematically deepen your knowledge and practice your pronunciation. Actively speak French with babbel.com, one of the biggest language learning platforms worldwide.â 3000 vocabulary words with images, pronunciation and sentence examples*â Intelligent review manager**â Integrated speech recognition for pronunciation exercisesâ Offline modeâ Basic and Advanced Vocabulary: Frenchâ Vocabulary trainer for beginners and advanced learnersâ Numerous themesâ Free appâ Optimized for tabletsâ Extra courses and features on babbel.com* The first lesson of any category is already included in this app. Other French vocabulary packages can be downloaded.** To be able to download additional vocabulary packages and use the review manager, you will need a free Babbel account. This is the only way the vocabulary you've learned can be saved and your progress analyzed. You can create your personal Babbel account directly on the app. This is absolutely FREE.--------------------About babbel.com:Learn French with Babbel: With the babbel.com website learning system, you can learn French flexibly online. The courses are divided into manageable themes and offer you a variety of different French exercises: Beginner and refresher courses, grammar, verb training, tongue twisters, phrasebooks and much more. The courses have been developed by experts and improved with years' worth of customer feedback. Interactive French exercises for vocabulary and grammar as well as other tools enable you to pinpoint and learn what you need. Fear of speaking? No problem. Thanks to integrated speech recognition, you can rate and practice your French pronunciation. The intelligent review manager presents the vocabulary you've learned in optimal intervals for review. This helps embed what you've learned in your long-term memory. Learning languages on the internet has never been so easy! With Babbel you won't just learn quickly, intuitively and flexibly, but also more affordably than with traditional language courses. You can try the first French exercises online - free of charge and with no obligations."But Babbel's focus on speaking, the wide selection of languages and the modest price make it competitive with both the free Duolingo and the sophisticated but pricey Rosetta Stone." - The Economist (Jun 14th 2013)Learn English, Spanish, French, Italian, German, Brazilian Portuguese, Swedish, Turkish, Polish, Dutch or Indonesian and communicate with people from all over the world.Just give it a try!We're happy to have your feedback. Write with your questions and suggestions to:support-mobile@babbel.comYour Babbel Mobile team-------------------- VISIT US:http://www.babbel.comFOLLOW US:http://twitter.com/#!/babbelCIRCLE US:https://plus.google.com/113649767554400102527FAN US:http://www.facebook.com/babbel.languages

reviews.title: Love it love it love it!
reviews.comment: This is the best app I have found by far!
reviews.author: Jennifer Corona

reviews.title: Lots of fun and really easy
reviews.comment: I\'m having a good time. Easy interface. I had no problem just jumping in and starting
reviews.author: Terra Luke

reviews.title: Enjoyable app
reviews.comment: An enjoyable tool for beginners to pick up the basic elements of French. Nice,  intuitive interface
reviews.author: Michael Fine

reviews.title: Easy to learn
reviews.comment: I love that I am learning French at my own pace... it\'d be better if it taught me how to grammatically put these words together in a sentence...
reviews.author: Dat Grl

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I loved it!!! , such a brilliant app for learning languages &its really helpful,it really deserves 5 stars
reviews.author: Sally Shehata

reviews.title: Great resource!
reviews.comment: Very convenient and helpful, well designed app.
reviews.author: Brianda Torres

reviews.title: Amazing and understanding
reviews.comment: This app teaches the user French in many ways, and is very easy to use! I can\'t wait to teach french to all my friends.
reviews.author: Rachel Blankenship

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: This is the best app, wonderful to learn and speak. Keep it up.
reviews.author: mohan raj

reviews.title: Still playing with it but I an pleased so far!
reviews.comment: I like the app. I speak a little french already and was looking for something to keep my skills up. This is perfect!
reviews.author: Asja Jackson

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Awesome app. Easy to use and easy to learn.
reviews.author: Heather McDowell

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: This app is awesome. Goes into detail and over the badis very well. Good for if you already know it and need refreshing.
reviews.author: Kel Carpenter

reviews.title: Learning french by myself
reviews.comment: Awesome, neat helpful app. Very through& vocab is split in reasonably proportion for effective learning.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Installed it quite a while ago and didn\'t get the hang of it until now. Used Rosetta stone a lot before, which seems rather close to this technique, but maybe with more repetitions. Since I\'m a quick learner this becomes boring sometimes. Since this app interacts by touch, it\'s also more fun. Just some animations like the mixing could be faster, otherwise top!
reviews.author: Andr\303\251 Dankert

reviews.title: Easy, simple and smooth
reviews.comment: Best French app out there for vocab. I LOVE it. It works smoothly and even grades you on your speech. While it doesn\'t have grammar, it does have common words and vocab. I have been speaking French for 4 years now, but this app is good for speakers on all levels.
reviews.author: Mary A

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I can easily rate it 5 If only phrases could be spoken slower. that would make my learning process greater, as i am fresh learner of French. However i love the app very much and i think it will help me gain new language.
reviews.author: Khaldoun Sultan Bitroy

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Helps with a chieving the French way to speak words. However the voice recognition facility doesn\'t work too well,at least with my voice and my first language is English.   Plenty of vocabulary thought.  Merci, Au revoir!  Joe La langue francise learner
reviews.author: Joe Hester

reviews.title: Outstanding!
reviews.comment: This program would be well worth paying for. It\'s detailed and comprehensive. It has a huge library that constantly updates. I could not be happier!
reviews.author: Demetriace Moore

reviews.title: Excellent refresher
reviews.comment: I\'ve had lessons in the past and this app is helping to bring all that knowledge back. Very easy to follow. Well put together.
reviews.author: April Edwards

reviews.title: Nice tool!
reviews.comment: Great vocabulary builder - also like that you can drop words of little interest from further review.
reviews.author: Michael Mocella

reviews.title: Enjoyable
reviews.comment: Easy to use. Enjoyable.  Useful.
reviews.author: Nora Gallagher
